dcterms:creator: B. Mildenhall
P. P. Srinivasan
M. Tancik
J. T. Barron
R. Ramamoorthi
R. Ng
dcterms:description: The LLFF dataset is used for evaluating novel view synthesis methods, particularly in the context of sparse input images. It provides a collection of scenes with varying complexities and is commonly used to benchmark the performance of 3D reconstruction techniques.
dcterms:title: LLFF Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Wang
Z. Chen
C. C. Loy
Z. Liu
dcterms:description: The NVS-RGBD dataset is designed for evaluating few-shot novel view synthesis methods, particularly focusing on depth ranking and spatial continuity regularization. It contains RGB-D images captured from various scenes, making it suitable for testing depth-aware synthesis techniques.
dcterms:title: NVS-RGBD Dataset
